comment: She was very kind and easy going. We had 3 major papers and a short quiz for each unit, very easy. You only get 2 unexcused absences which sucked just because there wasn't really a need to go to class but she explain every assignment in class, very straightforward.

Dr. Dutton is amazing! My favorite professor ever. She cares so much, and is so helpful. ENGL 1102 kind of sucks because so much weighs on a few grades, but she makes it easy to get an A. She sets you up so well! Loved her

Dr. Dutton is my favorite professor because she cares so much about her students. I have had her for 1101 and 1102 and in both courses we had three major essays with a multiple choice final exam and small assignments every so often that are super easy. She is easy to reach out to and gives so many resources for help. Gives extra credit as well.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Dutton is a great teacher that cares for their students. She does leave homework every class but if you organize enough it is extremely doable. Also, she really likes to work with international students so if English is not your native language you should definitely that this class and ENGL 1102 with her (if yo know italian she'll love you).
She is the best professor, and she gives extra credits. This professor helps a lot in the assignments

Dr. Dutton is a fantastic professor. We had three papers and a little online homework, but nothing was that hard if you followed the rubrics and put in the effort. Attendance is mandatory, but it's a small percentage of your grade. Going to class will help you through.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things
